events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position. Thank you for applying and we will review your qualifications shortly.
Your application has been categorized under Engineering for the Software Engineer role based on your experience and skills listed.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to your case and will reach out soon for the next steps.
Your initial screening interview has been completed successfully. We were impressed with your software development knowledge and experience.
Thank you for your prompt response and availability for the next interview round. We appreciate your enthusiasm for the Engineering role.
We have scheduled your technical interview with our lead engineer on May 10th at 10:00 AM UTC. Please prepare accordingly.
Congratulations! You have successfully completed the technical interview with strong problem-solving skills and coding abilities.
Your HR interview is scheduled for May 15th at 2:00 PM UTC. This will cover cultural fit and company values discussion.
You have completed the HR interview successfully. The panel was pleased with your communication skills and alignment with our company culture.
We are excited to extend you an offer for the Software Engineer position. Please review the compensation package and terms sent via email.
Thank you for your feedback regarding the offer details. We are glad to hear that you find the package acceptable.
The candidate has accepted the offer enthusiastically and is ready to proceed with the onboarding process.
Onboarding for the new Software Engineer began today, including setting up equipment, accounts, and introduction to the team.
The hiring process is now closed with the candidate successfully onboarded and integrated into the engineering department.
